description_0: A front view of a brown wooden plank bench fastened to a concrete square by metal legs with 4 bolts. A red and blue throw blanket is thrown over the upper left corner of the backrest. A yellow pool noodle is laid across the seat of the bench with a small portion of the noodle hanging off the right side of the bench. A small Aloe vera plant in a brown pot is placed underneath the bench. A pair of black sandals are placed in front of the bench. A round rock is placed to the right of the bench's right metal leg. Behind the bench, a sunlit field with 2 trees is visible.
description_1: A brown wooden bench on the side of a gray stone walkway. Behind and to the right of the bench is a row of green plants and pink and yellow flowers. Behind the flowers are bushes and trees that are casting a shadow on the right side of the entire image. The bench is also casting a shadow on the walkway extending toward the bottom of the image. In the top left corner of the image is a dirt road, beyond the dirt road in the background is a field of grass with strips of soil and plants that extends all the way to the top left corner of the image.
